name: Astrostorm
overview: An "avoid it" style game in which you must survive by avoiding falling asteroids in your space ship for as long as you can. This was developed by Vanja J. Utne and released as part of a 2002 mini-game competition. An updated shoot 'em up version called Astrostorm II was being developed in 2006, but never got past the preview/playable demo stage.
